mapper.select: SELECT r.idx, r.board_idx, r.myid, r.message, r.regroup, r.relevel, r.restep, r.writeday, b.subject AS board_subject FROM board_pet_reple r, board_pet b WHERE r.board_idx = b.idx and r.myid = #{myid} order by r.writeday DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into board_pet_reple (board_idx, myid, message, photo, regroup, relevel, restep, writeday) values (#{board_idx}, #{myid}, #{message}, #{photo}, #{regroup}, #{relevel}, #{restep}, now());
mapper.select: select * from board_pet_reple where board_idx=#{board_idx} order by idx desc
select photo from board_pet_reple where idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update board_pet_reple set message=#{message} where idx=#{idx}
